result.reason: Quality-of-life enhancement to prompt users to save updated passwords when authentication fails, reducing manual steps for credential rotation
result.approach: Detect authentication failure events from SSH (PuTTY exit code) and RDP (OnLoginComplete/OnFatalError), then show a dialog offering to update the stored password in ConnectionInfo and persist to the connections file

attempts.raw_output:
The issue requests that when a connection's password fails (e.g., SSH login failure), the app should prompt the user to enter and save a new password. This is a UX enhancement that would require detecting authentication failures across multiple protocols (RDP, SSH, etc.) and presenting a dialog to update the stored password.

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"Quality-of-life enhancement to prompt users to save updated passwords when authentication fails, reducing manual steps for credential rotation","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/PuttyBase.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/RDP/RdpProtocol.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInfo.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Forms/FrmInputBox.cs"],"approach":"Detect authentication failure events from SSH (PuTTY exit code) and RDP (OnLoginComplete/OnFatalError), then show a dialog offering to update the stored password in ConnectionInfo and persist to the connections file"}
```
